namespace = "idol.test/ns"
import {
	namespace = "example.test/ns"
	names = [
		"FooOptions"
	]
}
options {
	option {
		name = "a"
		type = .UNKNOWN
		value = [0x31, 0x32]
	}
	option {
		name = "b"
		type = .UNKNOWN
		value = [0x33, 0x34]
	}
}
options {
	schema_type = .MESSAGE
	schema_type_name = "example.test/ns\x1FFooOptions"
	option {
		name = "a"
		type = .U32
		value = [0x0C, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00]
	}
	option {
		name = "b"
		type = .U32
		value = [0x22, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00]
	}
	option {
		name = "nested.a"
		type = .U32
		value = [0x38, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00]
	}
	option {
		name = "unknown"
		type = .UNKNOWN
		value = [0x37, 0x38]
	}
	option {
		name = "nested.unknown"
		type = .UNKNOWN
		value = [0x39, 0x31, 0x30]
	}
}
message {
	name = "MessageWithOptions"
	options {
		option {
			name = "a"
			type = .UNKNOWN
			value = [0x31, 0x32]
		}
	}
	field {
		name = "field_with_options"
		tag = 1
		type = .U32
		options {
			option {
				name = "b"
				type = .UNKNOWN
				value = [0x33, 0x34]
			}
		}
	}
}
